channel.title: Npc Re-Spawn time?
channel.description:
Ok, So how do i set a npc's respawn time? like on dodian nech's respawn time is 250, how would i set it??
I'm using the source "project 16" (it owns)
It is NOT in npc.CFG all thats in there is name, lvl and hp.
Anyone know?
